channel.title: Drawing Request Time!
channel.description:
~The rules of the game:
1. People ("Requesters") post things that they want to see in glorious forum-drawing-o-vision 2. Peope draw ("Drawers") these things in glorious forum-drawing-o-vision 3. The first person to reply with an image to the suggestor's liking, that user gets kudos! 4. Fun had by all!:retard:
~Specification:
1. Do not use images that you found in the darker corners of the Internet, or any part of the internet for that matter. Rememeber, a good old google search-with-images will leave you exposed if the requester gets picky. 2. Be clear about which request you are replying to. 3. Be clear when you are giving kudos. If you would, please edit your original post to say that the kudos has been awarded, and to who. 4. Don't request or submit hentai or anything, because the mods won't love you for it. 5. Of course pictures taken in games are ok, especially Garry's Mod! Scans, digital drawings etc. fine. For bandwidth's sake, please don't make things too massive... 6. Don't try to assign yourself kudos. That's silly. 7. Didn't there use to be a whole part of the forum for this kind of thing? Have I missed it? Only too happy to move.:meh:
~Advice:
Drawers, don't go into too much detail, for if you're submitting a drawing you'll risk being beaten to the booty (Yarr. :pirate :slight_smile: .
(Any rules that don't make sense? PM me and I'll fix that when I can)
~~~~#Kudos Log#~~~~ (last updated: Tues 27th Nov)
Eli Vance: 1 Fnork: 1 (waiting confirmation from (rot)(fodder, but I'm granting it anyway) opsatcat: 1

item.title: Drawing Request Time!
item.dc:creator: Eli_Vance
item.description:
Kudos Count Marker

Stats for this round:
Fnork: 1 (that’s now my wallpaper. I thank you on behalf of the world for making such beauty.
opsatcat: 1 (Nice use of stig.)
(rot(fodder): No actual kudos, but that’s pretty manly.

Let the games commence!

Here’s a suggestion because we haven’t had one for five days, just to bump this thread a bit:

I request for somebody to draw Han Solo out of his face with moonshine and shooting at ewoks with a crossbow, standing on top of Chewbacca, who is crying and all tied up.

Read full topic

Mistake post, please remove if you would be so kind.

If there is a way to delete posts on this, please enlighten me

Read full topic

item.title: Drawing Request Time!
item.dc:creator: Fnork
item.description:
As for my request, I want to see an alligator soaring along a rainbow in a Rolls Royce.

1680×1050 478 KB

I realised that I had misread the request just I had very painstakingly completed the car, and I’m gonna let my work go to waste, so there you go.

Also, yes, kind of a sloppy job, some of the colours are bit wrong, and the wheels are really messy. Circles are really hard to work with in Flash.

Read full topic

item.title: Drawing Request Time!
item.dc:creator: opsatcat
item.description:
Disturbulator:

A Tank doing a Barrel Roll out of an AC-130 at 20,000 feet.

Pyro:

While firing at a nearby dragon that’s dogfighting with an X-wing.

Disturbulator:

The Viking riding the Dragon also needs to be playing a Guitar solo.

There you go: https://imgur.com/PkI4t

Couldn’t find a viking model though, so I used the next best thing.

item.title: Drawing Request Time!
item.dc:creator: Eli_Vance
item.description:
Maxey: Sylvester Stallone (as Rambo, the only kind of Sylvester Stallone) holding the very cute puppy.

Just to keep things moving, and because I really wanted to draw it:
Ok, I know that Rambo doesn’t have a beard. I’m sorry. I couldn’t find a rubber or anything. And thanks, zen, for fixing that horrendous dp.
Not going to post any more entries… unless there are some really good ones…

item.title: Drawing Request Time!
item.dc:creator: Eli_Vance
item.description:
~The rules of the game:

  1. People (“Requesters”) post things that they want to see in glorious forum-drawing-o-vision
  2. Peope draw (“Drawers”) these things in glorious forum-drawing-o-vision
  3. The first person to reply with an image to the suggestor’s liking, that user gets kudos!
  4. Fun had by all!:retard:

~Specification:

  1. Do not use images that you found in the darker corners of the Internet, or any part of the internet for that matter. Rememeber, a good old google search-with-images will leave you exposed if the requester gets picky.
  2. Be clear about which request you are replying to.
  3. Be clear when you are giving kudos. If you would, please edit your original post to say that the kudos has been awarded, and to who.
  4. Don’t request or submit hentai or anything, because the mods won’t love you for it.
  5. Of course pictures taken in games are ok, especially Garry’s Mod! Scans, digital drawings etc. fine. For bandwidth’s sake, please don’t make things too massive…
  6. Don’t try to assign yourself kudos. That’s silly.
  7. Didn’t there use to be a whole part of the forum for this kind of thing? Have I missed it? Only too happy to move.:meh:

~Advice:

Drawers, don’t go into too much detail, for if you’re submitting a drawing you’ll risk being beaten to the booty (Yarr. :pirate .

(Any rules that don’t make sense? PM me and I’ll fix that when I can)
